markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Embodied Legionary Subjectivity](/Feats.aspx?ID=3926) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Fleshwarp" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=338" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 29</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Cataphract Fleshwarp](/Heritages.aspx?ID=204) heritage

**Access**
You're from Nex

</column>

---

Nex's Fleshforges shaped you not to achieve individual greatness at arms, but rather to become a part of a legion, a modular piece integral to the combined arms stratagems of Nexian battlemages. You become trained in [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) and [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills, you instead gain the trained rank in another skill of your choice. You also become trained in [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8).
name: Embodied Legionary Subjectivity
